com.team08storyapp

Class BuiltInHelp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team08storyapp.BuiltInHelp

  • public class BuiltInHelp
extends java.lang.Object
    BuiltInHelp provides a pop up dialog to display help on the user interface for the screen the user is currently on.

    To display the help, call the BuiltInHelp's showDialog() method to display the pop up dialog passing it the calling activity and it's title and text to display in the pop up.

    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0 December 3, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen

    • Method Detail

      • showDialog

        public static void showDialog(Activity activity,
              java.lang.String helpTitle,
              java.lang.String helpText)
        When called displays a pop up dialog to the user containing help for the screen they are currently viewing.
        Parameters:
        activity - The calling activity in order to set up the help text that is a appropriate for the UI screen.
        helpTitle - The title to display on the top of the Help pop up.
        helpText - The text describing the help for the UI screen.
